page.title: 14The Strawberry Farm,St.Peter
page.content: Tourists are well catered for at the Strawberry Farm: there is a large car and coach park, a large cafeteria and barbecue area, an exhibition of World War II (1939-45) military vehicles and weapons, a two storey German bunker and fortress which was the Commander's Headquarters. There is also a craft centre and in the grounds are large models of well known buildings in Jersey, including Corbiere lighthouse, St. Helier Church, Mont Orgueil Castle, La Hougue Bie, Fishermen's Chapel, Grosnez Castle, the Smuggler's Inn, a Martello Tower, a Dolmen, thatched cottages and an old farmhouse.
